Scene - Class in scene
Scene class store all the scene components, including Background color, ambient light, geometries objects, camera and distance of the view plane from the Geometries objects.

setColor(double, double, double) - Method in class primitives.Color
Color setter to generate a color according to RGB components Each component in range 0..255 (for printed white color) or more [for lights]

setColor(Color) - Method in class primitives.Color
